description: Coming from Gnome 3 and their software center, it seems to do better at listing various software in the categories and seems to recognize programs that get installed, even from the terminal. The software boutique seems to not see any programs installed on the computer that weren't installed through it which saddens me some, but means it's room for improvement.
summary: Not bad, but doesn't work well with others

description:
Ein großartiges Software Center für den ersten Start des OS!
Was nur etwas stört das man öfter sein Password eingeben soll besser beim Start einmal. Ein Wunsch wäre das man hier direkt Software vorschlagen könnte.
me aparece un cartel que dice "esta aplicación no está confinada" y no sé qué hacer
